name: Oil Free Carrot Cake recipe.
description: Adapted from The Starch Solution. A similar Carrot Cake Recipe from McDougall newsletter here.
recipeIngredient: a generous inch of cinnamon (ginger, cloves, cardamom powders)
2/3 cup flour (I used whole wheat + spelt flour)
a few Tablespoons raisins and chopped walnuts (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the dates in water for 15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Soak the dates in water for 15 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Puree the carrots, dates with the water.
recipeInstructions.name: Puree the carrots, dates with the water.

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, add the carrot date puree and bring to a boil on low heat.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pan, add the carrot date puree and bring to a boil on low heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the agave and spices and cook for 10 minutes on low to thicken a bit.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the agave and spices and cook for 10 minutes on low to thicken a bit.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool the puree. Add vinegar to it and mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool the puree. Add vinegar to it and mix.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl mix the flours and baking powder.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl mix the flours and baking powder.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the puree and mix till just about combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the puree and mix till just about combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Add raisins and chopped walnuts and fold in(optional)
recipeInstructions.name: Add raisins and chopped walnuts and fold in(optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in preheated 365 degrees F for 35 minutes for two 3.5 inch ramekins, a few minutes longer for 1 pan, until a toothpick form the center comes out clean.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake in preheated 365 degrees F for 35 minutes for two 3.5 inch ramekins, a few minutes longer for 1 pan, until a toothpick form the center comes out clean.

keywords: healthy cake recipe, vegan cake recipe
